statements: DELETE FROM TemperatureTrends WHERE location_id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TemperatureTrends WHERE temperature < 20 AND trend = 'Stable';
DELETE FROM TemperatureTrends WHERE temperature > 30 AND date < '2022-07-01'
DELETE FROM TemperatureTrends WHERE location_id = 5 AND trend = 'Rising'
DELETE FROM Temperature_Readings WHERE location = 'New York' AND temperature > 80
DELETE FROM Climate_Data WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND average_temperature < 70

DELETE FROM temperature_data WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Location WHERE latitude > 50 AND longitude < -100;
